text: CLOSE With the launch of Lay's new regionally - inspired flavors that represent different regions across the U. S., they are put to the test by USA TODAY staff USA TODAY Lay's Cajun Spice flavor. Picture courtesy of Frito Lay. ( Photo : Frito Lay ) Everyone knows lobster rolls are associated with Maine and deep - dish pizza calls its home Chicago, but what happens when those flavors go into a potato chip? Frito - Lay has launched eight new regionally - inspired flavors under its Lay's brand that it says reflect different tastes from parts of the country. And we put them all to a taste test to see if they reminded anyone of home on the range, the land of Dixie or just about anywhere else. The Tastes
